document.full_text: an egyptian court on saturday ordered the dissolution of former president hosni mubarak's political party, meeting a demand of the pro-democracy movement whose protests ended his 30-year authoritarian rule.
document.title: egypt court dissolves mubarak's former ruling party
lines_and_colors: an egyptian court on saturday ordered the dissolution of former president hosni mubarak's political party, meeting a demand of the pro-democracy movement whose protests ended his 30-year authoritarian rule.
